data.title: MATRIX: Multi-phAse Transits Recovery from Injected eXoplanets toolkit
data.name: tkmatrix
data.description: Transits Inject and Recovery Multi-phase Analysis

evidence: "MATRIX is an injection-recovery software prepared to create grids of scenarios with a set of periods, radii and epochs of synthetic transiting exoplanet signals in a provided light curve."

"A multi-phase analysis can now be done with MATRIX easily by only setting a few parameters in a configuration file and running one line of code. Just execute the command below this text. ... `python3.8 -m tkmatrix --properties user-properties.yaml`"
"We are planning to write a scientific paper based on the usage of MATRIX. In the meantime, we encourage the users to cite the Software DOI in their research:"
